item.title: Episode 6
item.description: Im Back!! This week we celebrate the birthdays of David Ruffin of the Temptations, Phil Everly of the Everly Brothers, Janis Joplin, and Sam Cooke Set List 1. Tobacco Road-Nashville Teens 2.Wake up Susie-Everly Brothers 3.Down on Me-Janis Joplin 4.Big Girls dont Cry- the four seasons 5.Do you love me-Dave Clark Five 6.Ferry across the Mersey-Gerry and the pacemakers 7.Try a little tenderness-Otis Redding 8.One Fine Day-The Chiffons 9.Chain Gang-Sam Cooke 10.Game of Love-Wayne Fontana and the heartbreakers 11.They way you do the things you do-The Temptations
item.dc:creator: Smashed Guitar Radio
item.itunes:summary:
